author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Ankit Jain "Security issue in  update store payment setting." https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-2395 - OFBIZ-2395
1) Go to catalog > Stores > Select OFBiz E-Commerce Store
Now there are two options. Error come only with one of them.
Option 1: Edit any Payment Method. Submit the form at the bottom. Now click on NEXT link, you will see the error.
Option 2: Click on NEXT link, no errors.

author: julianfoad
msg: Clean up some icky file-externals stuff.
(merge_file, close_file): Don't make a special case for a file external:
the new text will be installed from the correct text-base anyway.
